name: Rei Taro
profile_summary: Results-driven Senior Software Engineer with over 10 years of experience in backend development and a strong focus on crafting robust and scalable systems. Proficient in **Java**, **Python** (including frameworks such as **FastAPI**, **Django**, **Flask**), and experienced with **REST** and **SOAP** APIs. Well-versed in **SQL** and database technologies including **Oracle**, with a deep understanding of modern frontend technologies such as **JavaScript** and its frameworks. Expertise in delivering successful projects in high-stakes environments, providing effective solutions in the financial technology sector while leveraging **AWS** and **Azure** for cloud-native architecture. Known for enhancing team productivity through collaboration and innovative thinking, having positively impacted projects for renowned organizations like VISA, Sii Poland, and Reply Polska.

experience.responsibilities:
Engineered backend services using **Python** with **FastAPI** to streamline document automation, user onboarding, and reporting workflows, enhancing efficiency by **30%**.
Developed event-driven solutions utilizing **Celery** and **Redis** for managing asynchronous processing of financial transaction requests, reducing processing time by **25%**.
Deployed microservices on **Azure App Services** and implemented **Terraform** for infrastructure as code, facilitating smooth cloud operations across **5** different environments.
Created and maintained data pipelines for regulatory data exchange utilizing **Apache Airflow** and **Azure Functions**, ensuring timely and accurate data flow with **99%** reliability.
Led security assessments and integrated **OAuth2** and **Azure AD B2C** for secure and scalable authentication systems to comply with industry standards.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to address system integration challenges, ensure compliance, and oversee release strategies across **10** major projects.

• Developed backend systems in **Python** and **FastAPI** to automate document workflows, streamline user onboarding, and handle complex reporting processes.
• Created event-driven microservices using **Celery** and **Redis**, enabling asynchronous processing of financial data and transaction requests.
• Managed the deployment of microservices on **Azure App Services**, leveraging **Terraform** for infrastructure automation to maintain consistent and scalable environments.
• Engineered data pipelines for the secure exchange of regulatory data, using **Apache Airflow** and **Azure Functions** to automate and streamline the data flow, processing over **10,000** transactions daily.
• Performed security audits, ensuring compliance with industry standards, and integrated **OAuth2** and **Azure AD B2C** to manage authentication and secure access controls.
• Collaborated with cross-functional teams to ensure smooth system integration, regulatory compliance, and successful release management.

• Developed backend services for trade execution and portfolio management leveraging **Python**, **Flask**, and **PostgreSQL** to enhance trading operations.
• Engineered real-time price feed processors using **asyncio**, **WebSockets**, and **Redis** for efficient, up-to-the-minute trading data, supporting **high-frequency transactions** in over **9** markets.
• Collaborated with frontend teams to deliver seamless data integration through **REST APIs** and **WebSocket** channels, ensuring user interactions are smooth and responsive.
• Ensured compliance with regulatory requirements, including **MiFID II** and **GDPR**, while implementing robust internal data security protocols.
• Implemented a comprehensive suite of tests utilizing **PyTest**, **tox**, and mock servers, streamlining QA and CI processes for effective developmental cycles, achieving a **25% reduction** in deployment time.
• Introduced job queuing and scheduling solutions with **Celery** and **RabbitMQ**, optimizing backend task execution and managing processes for an increased **40% efficiency** in task handling.
